# scrollIndicators

**Type Property**

The scroll indicators placement.

## Declaration

```swift
static var scrollIndicators: ContentMarginPlacement { get }
```

## Discussion

Scrollable views like [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ScrollView] will use this placement to inset their scroll indicators, but not their content.

## Getting the placement

- **automatic**: The automatic placement.
- **scrollContent**: The scroll content placement.
title: scrollIndicators
